ellenosborne.comment: With all my colleagues in agreement, it's clear we share a commitment to supporting our students' needs.

grahampaige.comment: We have all seen the tremendous growth in student enrollment this year.  We did not plan for this kind of change when putting together our original budget.  Because  And our original motion does align with what he said tonight about looking at every dollar, ensuring every dollar has a purpose in terms of student growth achievement.
